channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Businesses Can Meet The Climate Risk And Adaptation Finance Gap
item.description: The issue has been highlighted in a recent report, which looks at how businesses can mitigate environmental risks, and possible avenues for finance.

item.title: Apple iPhone 17 Release Date: Your Complete Countdown
item.description: In under five weeks, we’ll know all about the iPhone 17 series. This is your comprehensive schedule to what’s coming when, down to the minute.

item.title: Microsoft Offers Free Windows Downloads—Do Not Miss Deadline
item.description: More than 700 million users must act now.

item.title: Russia Has An Arsenal Of New AI Drones Built With Smuggled U.S. Chips
item.description: Russia has fielded three AI-enabled attack drones using machine vision to navigate and find targets including an upgraded Shahed. And they are powered...

item.title: One UI 8 Release Date: Samsung Expands Beta To More Galaxy Phones
item.description: Samsung is rolling out One UI 8 beta to a wider range of Galaxy devices, including Galaxy-A series phones in the coming weeks.

item.title: Scarcity and abundance

item.title: Compounding luck
